title: Designing Elementary Mathematics Pedagogy through Web-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A process where in-service elementary teachers design real-life problem-solving math classes using web-based tools, emphasizing collaboration and integration of online resources in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can complete math project lesson designs using web-based collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.)
Learners can propose ways to adapt digital content (interactive worksheets, educational apps, etc.) to elementary math curricula
Learners can improve lesson design proposals through peer assessment and feedback systems in PBL environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
